disp-quote.p: “This one portrays a lot of lessons, if a person reads the message and sees the picture they will be able to tell that a person who is suffering from flu looks like this (Logo B). It is difficult for people to tell if indeed that picture (Logo A) shows a person, yes we can see that it looks like a bug but they won't understand the connection between the bug and the disease it causes. ” Woman, FGD with pregnant women
